name: Youtube Hashtag + Like Bar Color
description:
This one changes the color of :
- youtube hashtags
- like button
- like / dislike bar

The color is white but can be changed! ( White works very nice with the dark mode on youtube)

TAGS:
LikeBar
Hashtag
Youtube 
Color
Title bar
Youtube title
Youtube title bar
additional_info:
V 1.0
- added customization
- added Dislike Bar / Dislike button color.
